casebody.data:
IN RE: T.T.E. 238A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 2, 2018 Michelle F. Lynch, Attorney at Law, for T.T.E. Janelle Varley, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 1st of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 2nd of August 2018."
